wordpressPost.title: Designers are meant to be loved.
wordpressPost.content: It’s also a cultural change, a shift in mindset where the whole company supports a new way of thinking.
wordpressPost.excerpt: It’s also a cultural change, a shift in mindset where the whole company supports a new way of thinking.

siteMetadata.description: Kick off your next, great Gatsby project with this default starter. This barebones starter ships with the main Gatsby configuration files you might need.
